Intro.Title: OBS Setup
Intro.Description: IMPORTANT: Plugin supports OBS v28 and higher.
Intro.Description2: Websocket password MUST BE SET by going to Tools->"obs-websocket Settings" menu in OBS and MANUALLY setting a password (ignore the scary warning). Also verify the port number in that screen and fill both in next page.
Intro.NextStep: Finished configuring WebSockets Server? Press LINK to continue..

Pairing.Title: Server Info
Pairing.Description: The 'Ip' and 'Port' should be kept as is, unless you made changes in OBS. Also, ensure to input the password you set in OBS

Result.ValidateDescription: This should take up to 5 seconds if all settings are correct...
Result.SuccessDescription:
Enjoy using OBS with your Stream Deck.
You may close this window.
Result.FailDescription: We failed to save the settings. Validate the Ip/Port/Password are correct and that you're not using Websocket v5.x. For support:
